comment: She is SO POLITICAL, a democratic nut to be nice. She bashes over and over the apposing side. She rants every class period. I do not enjoy going to her class.

Professor Laney is a great professor. She is nice and I enjoyed this course. Make sure you read what she assigns and pay attention to world events like the news because the class will consist of discussing about how world events relate to community organizing. Besides that her assignments are clear and you will have to do a paper in her class.

Professor Laney's class is extremely long, and by long I mean boring. Her lectures are painful to sit through. The later the class, the more painful it is. She tries really hard to spice up her classes but it doesn't work. She's not really funny like other professors so I guess that's why. Oh, you better read for class because she does pop quizzes.

She is a pretty average teacher. The lectures seem long and boring, but it is not that bad. She expects you to read and there can sometimes be pop quizzes. There are short assignments in class, so make sure you do not miss class. Not a bad teacher.

Prof. Laney is BY FAR my favorite professor. I loved her class. The discussions were super interesting. If you are uncomfortable with discussing controversial issues, then this class probably is not for you. Read the articles and participate in class discussion and you'll do fine. There're no test but a few easy papers. I HIGHLY recommend!
Mrs. Laney is so sweet! Be on time! Read the materials prior to class- you will discuss as a group.

I enjoyed Professor Laney!  She was so much fun to take, and I learned so much from knowledge and that of those speakers she had come into the class.  The test were not all that hard if you read, attended class, and looked over her PP.  She is one of the best professors in the school! If she is teaching a class you need take her above all others!
Great Professor. Extremely Helpful and knowledgable. Be on time!
Professor Laney is amazing.  She always makes class interesting, and is very knowledgeable about what she is talking about. You do need to attend class as she takes role.  I would take her again.
He is very clear on her requirements and if you follow her instructions you will get an A. Reding the book will help you understand the material in class.  Very helpful professor.
